code: import{updateObject}from'../../Shared/Utility';import*as actionTypes from'../actions/actionTypes';var initialState={sideDrawerState:false,showDrawerToggleState:true,moveToHomeState:false};var sideDrawer=function sideDrawer(state,action){return updateObject(state,{sideDrawerState:action.sideDrawerState});};var showDrawerToggle=function showDrawerToggle(state,action){return updateObject(state,{showDrawerToggleState:action.showDrawerToggleState});};var moveToHomePage=function moveToHomePage(state,action){return updateObject(state,{moveToHomeState:action.moveToHomeState});};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.SIDE_DRAWER_CONTROL:return sideDrawer(state,action);case actionTypes.SHOW_DRAWER_TOGGLE:return showDrawerToggle(state,action);case actionTypes.MOVE_TO_HOME_PAGE:return moveToHomePage(state,action);default:return state;}};export default reducer;
